code: export default(function(props){var elseChild=props.children.filter(function(child){return child.type&&child.type.name==='Else';})[0];var ifChildren=props.children.filter(function(child){return child!==elseChild;});if(props.test){return ifChildren;}else if(elseChild){return elseChild;}else{return false;}});export var Else=function Else(props){return props.children;};
